column2: Support EN-DC (5DL+FR1) FR1: DL up to 3.6 Gbps / UL 542 Mbps LTE 5CA: DL Cat 19 up to 1.8 Gbps / UL Cat 13 up to 150 Mbps DC-HSPA+: DL 42 Mbps / UL 5.76 Mbps 4x4 MIMO and CA with 4x4 MIMO support FDD-LTE (Bands 1, 2, 3,4, 5, 7, 8, 12, 17, 18, 19, 20, 26, 28, 29) TD-LTE (Bands 38, 39, 40, 41) WCDMA (Bands 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 19) EDGE/GPRS/GSM (850, 900, 1800, 1900 MHz) 5G Non-Standalone (NSA): n1, n2, n3, n5, n7, n8, n12, n20, n28, n38, n77, n78 5G Standalone (SA): n77, n78
6.67 吋 20:9 (2400 x 1080) AMOLED 螢幕，搭載 90 Hz 螢幕刷新率 92% 屏佔比 700 nits 適合戶外閱讀亮度 Delta-E < 1 105% NTSC 色域，支援 110% DCI-P3 及 HDR10+ 康寧® 第六代強化玻璃，提供絕佳防護 SGS Eye Care Display 護眼認證 十指觸控電容式感應 (支援手套模式)

GNSS support GPS (L1/L5), Glonass (L1), Galileo (E1/E5a), BeiDou (B1/B2a), QZSS (L1/L5) and NavIC (L5)
